meanings.sent1: The picnic basket comprising sandwiches and fruits was perfect for our outing.
meanings.sent2: The ingredients comprising the cake were flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent3: The jigsaw puzzle comprising various pieces kept us entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her smile comprising warmth and kindness lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The diverse team comprising individuals from different backgrounds worked well together.

meanings.definition: To consist of or be made up of
meanings.sent1: The necklace comprising pearls and a silver chain was a gift from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The committee comprising experts in different fields made important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich comprising peanut butter and pickles was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent4: His character comprising honesty and integrity earned him respect from others.
meanings.sent5: The painting comprising vibrant colors and bold strokes caught everyone's attention.
